install.name: RSform! Frontend List
install.author: www.rsjoomla.com
install.description: This module is used to display forms created with RSform!.

param.name: form_id
param.label: Form ID #
param.description: The id of the Form. You can find it in your List Forms screen (the last column).

param.name: template_module
param.label: Module Layout
param.description: This HTML code is parsed in the module position you choose. Do not remove {formdata} tag from this, since it is replaced with the data output.

param.name: template_formdatarow
param.label: Row Layout
param.description: This HTML code is parsed and all your field id's like {fullname} are replaced with users data.

param.name: limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: # of rows displayed per page. 0 for no limit.
